description:
The Icehouse release includes a server group REST API.  For these groups to actually function properly, the server group scheduler filters must be enabled.  So, these filters should be enabled by default since the API is also enabled by default.  If the API is not used, the scheduler filters will be a no-op.

http://lists.openstack.org/pipermail/openstack-dev/2014-April/032068.html
title: Enable ServerGroup scheduler filters by default

comments.content:

So, these filters should be enabled by default since the API is also enabled by default.  If the API is not used, the scheduler filters will be a no-op.

http://lists.openstack.org/pipermail/openstack-dev/2014-April/032068.html

commit 7b8402ed3ba734836119441bdf1a6d6c661c8df2
Author: Russell Bryant <email address hidden>
Date:   Mon Apr 7 15:40:11 2014 -0400

    Enable ServerGroup scheduler filters by default
    
    The Icehouse release includes a server group REST API. For these
    groups to actually function properly, the server group scheduler
    filters must be enabled. So, these filters should be enabled by
    default since the API is also enabled by default. If the API is not
    used, the scheduler filters will be a no-op.
    
    DocImpact
    Change-Id: Ia52d7fcfff52377d8beae2acd9b7eba9c6c74e09
    Closes-bug: #1303983
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

commit 71661a9c05c846ce109b72706bba2087cb0b02a5

    scheduler filters.  Update the docs to reflect the updated defaults.

    Related-bug: #1303983
